SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiKeyException
Exception thrown when there are issues with the API key.
CacheException
Exception thrown when cache-related errors occur.
CityNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a city cannot be found by the OpenWeatherAPI.
ConfigurationException
Exception thrown when there are issues with SDK configuration.
DefaultOpenWeatherApiClient
Default implementation of the OpenWeatherApiClient interface.
DefaultWeatherCache
Default implementation of the WeatherCache interface with LRU eviction and TTL support.
DefaultWeatherSDK
Default implementation of WeatherSDK interface for Phase 1.
NetworkException
Exception thrown when network-related errors occur during API communication.
OpenWeatherApiClient
Contract for OpenWeatherAPI HTTP integration providing weather data retrieval capabilities.
RateLimitException
Exception thrown when the OpenWeatherAPI rate limit is exceeded.
SDKConfiguration
Immutable configuration object that holds all settings for the Weather SDK.
SDKConfiguration.TimeoutConfig
Immutable record for HTTP timeout configuration.
SDKMetrics
Immutable snapshot of SDK performance metrics and statistics.
SDKMode
Enumeration representing the operating modes for the Weather SDK.
SDKRegistry
Registry for managing multiple WeatherSDK instances with different API keys.
SystemInfo
Represents system information including sunrise and sunset times.
Temperature
Represents temperature data including current temperature and perceived temperature.
Weather
Represents the weather conditions (main category and detailed description).
WeatherCache
Interface contract for weather data caching with LRU eviction and TTL (Time-To-Live) support.
WeatherData
Immutable data transfer object representing the complete weather information for a location.
WeatherSDK
The main interface for the Weather SDK that provides weather data retrieval and management functionality.
WeatherSDKBuilder
Fluent builder for creating SDKConfiguration instances with validation.
WeatherSDKException
The base exception class for all weather SDK related errors.
Wind
Represents wind data including speed and direction information.
